subject: Re: [junit] @SuiteClasses(...) expects only TestCases?!?
msgSnippet: Michael, You should be able to.  Can you give a more complete example?  Thanks, David Saff ... [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messageBody:
Michael,

You should be able to. Can you give a more complete example? Thanks,

David Saff

On 11/16/06, Michael HÃ¼ttermann <michael@...> wrote:
>
> Hi,
>
> building and running a suite with @SuiteClasses expects passing
> TestCases (SampleTest.class, AnotherTest.class). Why can't I pass
> other suites too?
>
>
> @RunWith(Suite.class)
> @SuiteClasses( { SampleTest.class, AnotherTest.class})
> public class AllTests {
> public static void main(String[] args) {
> JUnitCore.main(AllTests.class.getName());
> }
> }
>
> Thanks.
>
> Cheers
> Michael
>
>
>
>
>
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
>
>
>
>
